ModMetaData.name: Baby and Children

ModMetaData.description:
version 0.63
Adds Baby and children In game.

Russian Translation: Modg of lttlword.ru

Japanese Translation: Proxyer

Korean Translation: Lellel 


 - Remove prognancy from original. 
 - Baby and Children grow faster.
 - Adds control panel.
 - Now can make alien race Baby and Children.
 - Fix children texture Issue.
